message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to acquire [Product Name] for a price of $1,750,000. This is a significant value proposition for you, as you've indicated you value it at $1,500,000.  This product is truly one-of-a-kind, and I believe it will be a valuable asset to your [Bob's Company/Situation]. Please let me know your thoughts on this offer.
